xmp_schema.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML=File Properties
xmp_schema.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML_description=Non-editable file information about the active document

xmp_property.name: sample_rate
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/sample_rate_label=Sample Rate
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/sample_rate_description=The number of audio samples per second

xmp_property.name: channels
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/channels_label=Channels
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/channels_description=The number or type of channels in the document

xmp_property.name: bit_depth
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/bit_depth_label=Bit Depth
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/bit_depth_description=The number of bits of information for each sample

xmp_property.name: source_format
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/source_format_label=Source Format
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/source_format_description=A description of the way audio is stored in the document

xmp_property.name: uncompressed_size
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/uncompressed_size_label=Uncompressed Audio Size
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/uncompressed_size_description=The uncompressed size of the audio data

xmp_property.name: media_type
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/media_type_label=Media Type
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/media_type_description=A description of the types of media that the document contains

xmp_property.name: frame_rate
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/frame_rate_label=Frame Rate
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/frame_rate_description=The number of video frames per second

xmp_property.name: disk_size
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/disk_size_label=Size on Disk
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/disk_size_description=The actual size of the file as it is stored on a disk

xmp_property.name: file_path
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/file_path_label=File Path
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/file_path_description=The absolute path to the file on disk

xmp_property.name: file_modified
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/file_modified_label=Modified
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/file_modified_description=Date and time the file was last modified

xmp_property.name: metadata_modified
xmp_property.label: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/metadata_modified_label=XMP Modified
xmp_property.description: $$$/aui/AuditionPrivateFilePropDefsXML/metadata_modified_description=The date and time any metadata for this resource was last changed
